title: Pangoan
paragraph: The Pangoan is native to the {{ Wasteland # article/islands/wasteland }} and has also spread to the {{ Dark Desert # article/islands/dark-desert }}. He is distantly related to the {{ Ranax # article/units/ranax }}, but with a calm nature compared to the aggressive Ranax.

dynamicContents.content: The strength of the Pangoan is that no unit is effective against him. Pangoan has a balanced ratio between attack and defense and therefore can be used in every situation. A good defensive strategy always includes Pangoan to reduce a potentially effective attack.
The Pangoan can be recruited in both late game islands Wasteland and Fiery Desert, which makes him a popular allrounder unit.

As he has no weakness to other units, he have no effectiveness against other units too. A huge disadvantage of the Pangoan is the slow movement speed. If you don't have {{ Ovivis # article/units/ovivi }} to transport them, they need a long time to swap between islands.
